successes.title: THE DRINKING JACKET: the ultimate gift for any drinker!
successes.description: Order yourÂ Drinking Jacket today! With a bottle opener zipper, koozie pocket, drinking mitts, flask pocket, and sunglass holder, it's destined to be your favorite hoodie!TheDrinkingJacket.com

Pledges.description: Thanks! You're awesome for helping us out! As a backer at any level, you'll have access to our updates and videos.

The Drinking Jacket (Early Bird Special)! - Get The Drinking Jacket at this reduced price if you order early! (XS-XXL only)
(free shipping in the US)

The Drinking Jacket - You'll get your very own Drinking Jacket and be able to drink warmly in style! (XS-XXL only)
(free shipping in the US)

The Drinking Jacket (TALL) - For anyone wanting an LT, XLT or XXLT, it costs a bit more to make and ship. But, we still want you to get your own Drinking Jacket and be able to drink warmly in style!
(free shipping in the US)

The Drinking Jacket (BIG & TALL) - For anyone wanted a XXXL-XXXXL, it costs a bit more to make and ship. But, we still want you to get your own Drinking Jacket and be able to drink warmly in style!
(free shipping in the US)

The Drinking Jacket + Travel Flask + signed card from Zane Lamprey - You'll get The Drinking Jacket, a metal-detector proof travel flask, and a card included with the hoodie signed by Zane!
(free shipping in the US) (XS-XXL only)

The Drinking Jacket (Big and Tall) + Travel Flask + signed card from Zane Lamprey - You'll get The Drinking Jacket, a metal-detector proof travel flask, and a card included with the hoodie signed by Zane!
(free shipping in the US) (XXXL-XXXXL only)

The Drinking Jacket + Travel Flask + Personalized Signed Card + Bottle-Opener Cap  - You'll get The Drinking Jacket, a metal-detector proof travel flask, a personalized card included with the hoodie signed by Zane, and a bottle-opener cap! (XS-XXL only)
(free shipping in the US)
Two Drinking Jackets - You'll get two Drinking Jackets! One to keep and one to give as a gift! (XS-XXL only) (free shipping in the US)

Two Drinking Jackets + Two Travel Flasks + a Personalized Signed Card + Two Beanies + Two Bottle-Opener Caps  - You'll get two Drinking Jackets, two metal-detector proof travel flasks, a card included with the hoodie signed by Zane, two fleece-line beanies, and two bottle-opener caps! (XS-XXL only)
(free shipping in the US)
A Six-Pack of Drinking Jackets - You'll get six Drinking Jackets! One to keep and five to give as gifts! (XS-XXXXL) (all available sizes) (free shipping in the US)

Party in New York City! You'll get the Drinking Jacket, Travel Flask and two VIP tickets to a party hosted by Zane in New York City! (Does not include travel or hotel) (You must be 21+ to attend) You will be given at least a month's notice before the date of party. (XS-XXXXL) (free shipping in the US)

Party in Los Angeles! You'll get the Drinking Jacket, Travel Flask and two VIP tickets to a party hosted by Zane in Los Angeles! (Does not include travel or hotel) (You must be 21+ to attend) You will be given at least a month's notice before the date of party. (XS-XXXXL) (free shipping in the US)

Dinner & Party in New York City! You'll get Two Drinking Jackets, Two Travel Flasks and two tickets to a private dinner with Zane and two VIP tickets to a party hosted by Zane in NYC! (Does not include travel or hotel) (You must be 21+ to attend) You will be given at least a month's notice before the date of party. (XS-XXXXL) (free shipping in the US)

Dinner & Party in Los Angeles! You'll get Two Drinking Jackets, Two Travel Flasks and two tickets to a private dinner with Zane and two VIP tickets to a party hosted by Zane in LA! (Does not include travel or hotel) (You must be 21+ to attend) You will be given at least a month's notice before the date of party. (XS-XXXXL) (free shipping in the US)
